To anyone familiar with history of anti-Catholic and anti-Semitic sentiment in US, current #SCOTUS composition is stunning sign of progress
It is a wonderful thing that there is no religious test for public office, and that opportunity has expanded for religious minorities
Catholics and Jews were once second-class citizens. Today there are 5 Catholics and 3 Jews on #SCOTUS.
Fun fact: if confirmed, #Gorsuch will be the first Protestant to pass Senate confirmation to #SCOTUS in 27 years (since Souter in 1990).

Media gets facts right, thinks job is done. But Americans' distrust of media is about bias in narrative, story selection, framing, not facts
Instead, you chose to use your visit to CIA to complain about the media's coverage of the crowd size at your inauguration.
There are 10,000 US troops there. The Afghan government is on the brink. The Taliban are resurgent. AQ is reconstituting. What will you do?
You won the presidency. You are the commander in chief. You never once mentioned Afghanistan on the campaign trail.
Detailing your plan to win the war in Afghanistan, or the one in Iraq, would have been an appropriate subject for your visit to @CIA today.
Mr. President, what is your plan to win the war in Afghanistan? @POTUS @realDonaldTrump
